courses.name: Capstone Internship in International Studies
courses.description: Internship limited to students pursuing the AB in International Studies Degree. May be repeated to a maximum of six hours. Graded on S/U basis only.

courses.name: Capstone Readings in International Studies
courses.description: Independent readings with supervisory faculty member. Open only to international studies majors. May be repeated up to a maximum of 6 hours.

courses.name: Pre-Departure Seminar for the TaLK Program
courses.description: Prior to beginning the TaLK Program in Korea, students will explore Korean language, culture and educational system through seminars and workshops provided by the Asian Affairs Staff and guest speakers. Graded on A-F basis only.

courses.name: Internship in International Studies
courses.description: Internship limited to students pursuing the AB in International Studies degree.  May be repeated to a maximum of six hours.  Graded on S/U basis only.

courses.name: Readings in International Studies
courses.description: Independent readings with supervisory faculty member. Open only to International Studies majors. May be repeated up to a maximum of 6 hours.

courses.name: Special Readings in International Studies
courses.description: Independent readings with supervisory faculty member; this course serves as the students' capstone experience.  Open only to International studies majors.

courses.name: Capstone Internship in International Studies
courses.description: Internship experience which serves as the student's capstone experience.  Program advisor must approve internships.  Section 2 of this course will be designated for Service Learning Capstone experience.  Graded on S/U basis only.
